label: Create and manage worksheets and workbooks (30-35%)

skills.label: Create worksheets and workbooks
items: Create a workbook, import data from a delimited text file, add a worksheet to an existing workbook, copy and move a worksheet

skills.label: Navigate in worksheets and workbooks
items: Search for data within a workbook
Navigate to a named cell, range, or workbook element
Insert and remove hyperlinks

skills.label: Format worksheets and workbooks
items: Change worksheet tab color, rename a worksheet, change worksheet order, modify page setup, insert and delete columns or rows, change workbook themes, adjust row height and column width, insert headers and footers

skills.label: Customize options and views for worksheets and workbooks
items: Hide or unhide worksheets, hide or unhide columns and rows, customize the quick access toolbar, change workbook views, change window views, modify document properties, change magnification by using zoom tools, display formulas

skills.label: Configure worksheets and workbooks for distribution
items: Set a print area, save workbooks in alternative file formats, print all or part of a workbook, set print scaling, display repeating row and column titles on multipage worksheets, inspect a workbook for hidden properties or personal information, inspect a workbook for accessibility issues, inspect a workbook for compatibility issues

skills.label: Insert data in cells and ranges
items: Replace data
Cut, copy, or paste data
Paste data by using special paste options
Fill cells by using auto fill
Insert and delete cells

skills.label: Format cells and ranges
items: Merge cells, modify cell alignment and indentation, format cells by using format painter, wrap text within cells, apply number formats, apply cell formats, apply cell styles

skills.label: Summarize and organize data
items: Insert sparklines, outline data, insert subtotals, apply conditional formatting

skills.label: Create and manage tables
items: Create an excel table from a cell range, convert a table to a cell range, add or remove table rows and columns

skills.label: Manage table styles and options
items: Apply styles to tables, configure table style options, insert total rows

skills.label: Filter and sort a table
items: Filter records, sort data by multiple columns, change sort order, remove duplicate records

label: Perform operations with formulas and functions (10-15%)

skills.label: Summarize data by using functions
items: Insert references, perform calculations by using the sum function, perform calculations by using min and max functions, perform calculations by using the count function, perform calculations by using the average function

skills.label: Perform conditional operations by using functions
items: Perform logical operations by using the if function, perform logical operations by using the sumif function, perform logical operations by using the averageif function, perform statistical operations by using the countif function

skills.label: Format and modify text by using functions
items: Format text by using right, left, and mid functions
Format text by using upper, lower, and proper functions
Format text by using the concatenate function

skills.label: Create charts
items: Create a new chart, add additional data series, switch between rows and columns in source data, analyze data by using quick analysis

skills.label: Format graphic elements
items: Resize charts, add and modify chart elements, apply chart layouts and styles, move charts to a chart sheet

skills.label: Insert and format objects
items: Insert text boxes and shapes, insert images, modify object properties, add alternative text to objects for accessibility
